column4: HOLY CRAP. Is this a right place to come and say just how awesome Ubuntu is? The last time I used Ubuntu was 6.04. Boy have the improvements been awesome. Practically everything works !!!
yeah i like it, i think it really encourages desktop users to get into the open source community

Granted, I am using a 32 bit system, but still, Java and Flash work smoothly on Firefox, mp3s and videos actually play, external monitors etc works, suspend to ram / disk / hibernation all work, boot times are fast, wifi works. And just wow, after a fresh install I got everything I needed all from the command line.
Rupp1, cheater99 yeah seriously. This is great
